#include<stdio.h>
#include<math.h>
inline void read(int *p)
{
 *p=0;
  int ch=getchar_unlocked();
 while(ch>='0' && ch<='9')
      {
        *p=(*p<<3)+(*p<<1)+ch-48;
         ch=getchar_unlocked();
      }
}

inline void reads(long long int *p)
{
 *p=0;
  int ch=getchar_unlocked();
 while(ch>='0' && ch<='9')
      {
        *p=(*p<<3)+(*p<<1)+ch-48;
         ch=getchar_unlocked();
      }
}


int main()
{
int t;
long long int N,temp,cnt;
read(&t);
while(t--)
{
reads(&N);
if(N&(N-1)==0){putchar_unlocked('Y');putchar_unlocked('E');putchar_unlocked('S');putchar_unlocked(10);continue;}
bool flag=1;
for(int i=2;i<=45;i++)
 {
        temp=(long long int)round(pow(N,1.0/double(i)));
        cnt=temp;
        for(int j=2;j<=i;j++)
          {
            cnt=cnt*temp;
          }
         if(N==cnt) {putchar_unlocked('Y');putchar_unlocked('E');putchar_unlocked('S');flag=0;putchar_unlocked(10);break;}
 }
if(flag){putchar_unlocked('N');putchar_unlocked('O');putchar_unlocked(10);}
}

}
